_description: Four lines at the end of a copy of Durantis’s Speculum Iudiciale

HunHM19916.Transcription:
Twenty wynter glad and blythTwenty wynter þe and
                    þryfTwenty wynter stond in stedeTwenty wynter byde þy
                    bede
HunHM19916.Note:
Added to blank space at the end of William Durantis, Speculum
                        Iudiciale.
HunHM19916.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58: 255.
Dutschke,  C. W. 
             Guide to Medieval and Renaissance Manuscripts in the Huntington
                Library.
         2 vols. San Marino, CA: Huntington Library, 1989: 2.605.
